CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Play Hazzard [Hazard] - This dismantled, abandoned incline, with part of the protective fencer missing (see arrow) at 17th St., is a hazard to neighborhood children who play in area during the day and evening. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of children, including boy seated in center wearing plaid shirt and light colored shorts, gathered in vacant lot with collapsing building on left, site of former 17th Street Incline
